thread.title: Morning Technical Insight on These Personal Products Stocks -- Coty, e.l.f. Beauty, Edgewell Personal Care, and Energizer

author: cnbc.com
title: Morning Technical Insight on These Personal Products Stocks -- Coty, e.l.f. Beauty, Edgewell Personal Care, and Energizer
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 23, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on COTY, ELF, EPC, and ENR which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Ahead of today's trading session, WallStEquities.com covers Coty Inc. (NYSE: COTY), e.l.f. Beauty Inc. (NYSE: ELF), Edgewell Personal Care Co. (NYSE: EPC), and Energizer Holdings Inc. (NYSE: ENR). These companies are part of the Personal Products industry, which is involved in personal care or toiletries. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below. www.wallstequities.com/registration
Coty
New York headquartered Coty Inc.'s shares saw a slight decline of 0.67%, finishing Thursday's trading session at $20.66. A total volume of 4.85 million shares was traded. In the previous three months and over the past year, the stock has advanced 20.82% and 9.66%, respectively. The Company's shares are trading above their 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 3.99% and 12.98%, respectively. Moreover, shares of Coty, which together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, markets, sells, and distributes beauty products worldwide, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 55.54.
On February 08 th , 2018, Coty's Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.125 per common share, payable on March 15 th , 2018, to shareholders of record on February 28 th , 2018. Get the full research report on COTY for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=COTY
e.l.f. Beauty
On Thursday, shares in Oakland, California-based e.l.f. Beauty Inc. recorded a trading volume of 148,407 shares, and ended the session 3.27% higher at $20.84. The stock has gained 2.86% in the last month and 2.46% over the previous three months. The Company's shares are trading 0.03% above their 50-day moving average. Furthermore, shares of e.l.f. Beauty, which develops, markets, and sells beauty cosmetic products under the e.l.f. brand name, have an RSI of 54.89.
On February 13 th , 2018, e.l.f. Beauty announced that it will conduct a conference call on February 27 th , 2018, at 4:30 p.m. ET to discuss its Q4 FY17 and FY17 results. A press release detailing these results will be issued prior to the call. The conference call will be hosted by Tarang Amin, Chairman and CEO, and John Bailey, President and CFO. To experience our free membership services anytime/ anywhere and access the free report on ELF, click to register at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=ELF
Edgewell Personal Care
Shares in Chesterfield, Missouri headquartered Edgewell Personal Care Co. closed at $51.73, slightly down 0.48% from the last trading session. The stock recorded a trading volume of 401,096 shares. The Company's shares are trading 10.39% below their 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of the Company, which manufactures and markets personal care products in the wet shave, sun and skin care, feminine care, and infant care categories the US and internationally, have an RSI of 38.84.
On February 14 th , 2018, Edgewell Personal Care announced the appointment of Rod R. Little as CFO. Mr. Little served most recently as CFO with HSN Inc. and, prior to that, Elizabeth Arden Inc. He will begin March 05 th , 2018, and will be based in the Company's Shelton, Connecticut office, reporting to David Hatfield, CEO, President, and Chairman of the Board of Directors. Join our big investor community at Wall St. Equities today and get your free report on EPC at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=EPC
Energizer Holdings
St. Louis, Missouri headquartered Energizer Holdings Inc.'s stock ended 1.48% higher at $54.17 with a total trading volume of 497,164 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 20.51% over the previous three months and 0.59% over the past year. The stock is trading above its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 3.86% and 12.29%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of Energizer, which together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, markets, and distributes household batteries, specialty batteries, and lighting products worldwide, have an RSI of 52.29.
On January 29 th , 2018, Energizer announced the appointment of Patrick J. Moore as Vice Chairman of the Board of Directors, effective immediately. Mr. Moore, 63, has served on the Company's Board since July 2015, and serves as Chair of its Audit Committee. He is President and CEO of PJM Advisors, LLC, a private equity investment and advisory firm. Know more about ENR in our free research coverage at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=ENR
